stakeholders_involved.name: California Department of Social Services (CDSS)
stakeholders_involved.role: Lead agency; convened stakeholder workgroups, Prevention Summit, and ongoing engagement for plan development and implementation

stakeholders_involved.name: Other state departments, counties, Tribes
stakeholders_involved.role: Collaborated in plan development, ongoing consultation, and annual planning updates

stakeholders_involved.name: Child Welfare Directors
stakeholders_involved.role: Provided feedback through focused conversations during planning

stakeholders_involved.name: Chief Probation Officers
stakeholders_involved.role: Provided feedback through focused conversations during planning

stakeholders_involved.name: Youth and parents with lived experience
stakeholders_involved.role: Provided feedback through surveys and conversations; ongoing engagement for implementation

stakeholders_involved.name: Service providers and training academies
stakeholders_involved.role: Provided feedback through surveys and conversations; involved in implementation

stakeholders_involved.name: Parents Anonymous
stakeholders_involved.role: Provided plan feedback; venue for ongoing implementation discussions

stakeholders_involved.name: California Youth Connection
stakeholders_involved.role: Provided plan feedback; venue for ongoing implementation discussions

stakeholders_involved.name: Youth Empowerment Project
stakeholders_involved.role: Provided plan feedback; venue for ongoing implementation discussions

stakeholders_involved.name: Citizen Review Panels
stakeholders_involved.role: Provided plan feedback; venue for ongoing implementation discussions

stakeholders_involved.name: Tribal Advisory Committee
stakeholders_involved.role: Provided input on plan development and revisions; formal consultation

stakeholders_involved.name: Local service organizations (CBOs, FRCs, behavioral health agencies)
stakeholders_involved.role: Conduct assessments, plan treatment, provide case management and aftercare, participate in resource mapping

stakeholders_involved.name: Schools, healthcare providers, local organizations
stakeholders_involved.role: Refer families to community pathway for prevention services

engagement_methods.description: Multiple workgroups convened by CDSS since 2019 to orient stakeholders and gauge needs/readiness for prevention services
Widely attended summit to orient stakeholders and gather input for plan development
Surveys conducted to gather feedback from youth, parents, providers, and other stakeholders on plan development
Targeted discussions with Child Welfare Directors, Chief Probation Officers, youth, parents, and providers for plan feedback
Ongoing annual updates to the plan in collaboration with counties, stakeholders, and Tribes for program enhancements
Regular government-to-government consultations and engagement of the Tribal Advisory Committee for plan input

engagement_methods.method: Intentional and targeted engagement with youth and parents
engagement_methods.description: Feedback gathered from youth and parents through groups such as Parents Anonymous, California Youth Connection, Youth Empowerment Project, and Citizen Review Panels
Local agencies map community resources, contracted/non-contracted services, and grassroots organizations to identify gaps and plan service delivery
Local agencies conduct asset mapping and needs assessments to inform EBP selection and prevention planning

governance_structures.name: Tribal Advisory Committee
governance_structures.purpose: Solicit input on development and revisions of the Title IV-E Prevention Program; formal consultation with Tribes
governance_structures.membership: Tribal representatives, CDSS, state and county representatives
governance_structures.authority: Advisory; provides input and feedback on plan development and revisions

governance_structures.name: State Prevention Advisory Committee
governance_structures.purpose: State-level oversight and advisory body for prevention program implementation and continuous quality improvement
governance_structures.membership: State agency leaders, technical assistance providers, local representatives, lived expertise
governance_structures.authority: Oversight and advisory; communicates with counties and local cross-sector planning entities

governance_structures.name: Local Cross-Sector Partnerships
governance_structures.purpose: Local planning, implementation, and ongoing improvement of prevention services
governance_structures.membership: Child welfare, probation, service providers, tribal representatives, local supervisors, case managers, county and tribal representatives, lived expertise
governance_structures.authority: Local planning and implementation; informs state oversight and CQI
